sent.description: Render as a sent message (so from current user)
sent.description_zh: 渲染为已发送消息（来自当前用户）

bg-color.description: Color name for component from the Quasar Color Palette
bg-color.desc: Color name (from the Quasar Color Palette) for chat bubble background
bg-color.description_zh: Quasar Color Palette （类星体调色板） 中组件的颜色名称

text-color.desc: Color name (from the Quasar Color Palette) for chat bubble text

avatar.description: URL to the avatar image of the author
avatar.description_zh: 指向作者头像图像的 URL

text.description: Array of strings that are the message body. Strings are not sanitized (see details in docs)
text.description_zh: 作为消息正文的字符串数组。字符串未被清理（请参阅文档中的详细信息）

size.description_zh: 12 分中的 1-12 分（与 col-* 相同）

label-html.desc: Render the label as HTML; This can lead to XSS attacks so make sure that you sanitize the message first

name-html.desc: Render the name as HTML; This can lead to XSS attacks so make sure that you sanitize the message first

text-html.desc: Render the text as HTML; This can lead to XSS attacks so make sure that you sanitize the message first

stamp-html.desc: Render the stamp as HTML; This can lead to XSS attacks so make sure that you sanitize the message first

slots.name: default
slots.description: You can use this slot to define a custom message (overrides props)
slots.description_zh: 您可以使用此插槽来定义自定义消息 （overrides props）

slots.name: avatar
slots.description: Slot for avatar; Suggestion: QAvatar, img
slots.description_zh: 头像插槽;建议： QAvatar， img

slots.name: name
slots.description: Slot for name; Overrides the 'name' prop

slots.name: stamp
slots.description: Slot for stamp; Overrides the 'stamp' prop

slots.name: label
slots.description: Slot for label; Overrides the 'label' prop
